```{r}
#| include: false
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)

FileData <-
  tibble::tibble(
    file = dir(here("docs"), pattern = "*.csv$"),
    meta_file = sub("\\.csv$", ".html", file),
    meta_exists = file.exists(here("docs", "meta", meta_file)),
    metadata = case_when(
      meta_exists ~ paste0("[Metadata](", "meta/", meta_file, ")"),
      !meta_exists ~ "N/A"
    ),
    dataset = paste0("[", file, "](", file, ")")
  ) |>
  mutate()
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| message: false
#| warning: false
FileData |>
  select(dataset, metadata) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_markdown(everything()) |>
  opt_interactive(
    use_search = TRUE,
    page_size_default = 50
  )

```
